## Announcements

-   See this [document for knitting more beautiful tables](live_code/knitr.qmd).
-   If your group would like focused time with Prof. Tang, sign up for 15-minute meetings here: [Calendly link](https://calendly.com/beckytang/1-1-with-prof-tang)
    -   Feel free to book back-to-back meetings if you think that is necessary
-   **Midterm 2 revisions** (written portion only)
    -   Revisions are due to Prof. Tang by Friday 12:00pm at the latest. There will be a box outside the office for you to place the revisions if she is unavailable.
    -   Please submit your original midterm alongside your revisions. Ensure the problem numbers are clearly indicated, and **write and sign the Honor Code statement on your revision.**
    -   **You are not allowed to consult other students nor TAs, but you may ask Prof. Tang for clarifications and use your notes.**
    -   Questions that are available for revision are: 2a, 2d, 3a, and any two multiple choice questions of your choice
        -   For multiple choice questions, you must explain/justify/show work for why your new choice is correct
        -   For all other questions, you should completely re-do the part you are revising. The exception is if your only revision is to check conditions. In this case, you do not need to re-do the whole part
    -   Up to 25% of points back are available (depending on quality of revision)
